title: Henneth Annun (4R125)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 6T, each roaming minion skirmishing a Ring-bound companion is strength -2. Skirmish: Spot a [Gondor] Man and discard this condition to wound a roaming minion.
Lore:	”'This is the Window of the Sunset….'”
Rarity:	R
